msg: I think this the first iteration of AXISCPP-148 & AXISCPP-260.

author: whitlock
msg: Move common header files to include/axis

author: whitlock
msg: Correct newlines in the generated source code

author: whitlock
msg: Fix build break on Windows. The error was "undeclared identifier BUF_SIZE line 540". The bug was that BUF_SIZE was declared in Channel.h in a #ifdef that excluded windows, but it was used on all platforms in Channel.cpp. The fix was simply to move the declaration of BUF_SIZE out of the #ifdef.

author: samisa
msg: Fixed Jira AXISCPP-269. There was a bug in chunk reading. Cleaned up the code a bit as well.
